alert.note: Alert for Lower Kobuk and Noatak Valleys (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 21 at 11:16AM AKST until February 23 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 3 PM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow with near blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 18 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Lower Kobuk and Noatak Valleys. * WHEN...From 3 PM today to 3 PM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Visibility less than one quarter mile at times. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A brief break in the heavy snow is expected Wednesday morning.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.
